item.title: Looking for Video Editor (Infographic Visualization) to create product video ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are an agency seeking a skilled Video Maker/Editor to create Product Visualization videos for one of our clients who sells restaurant kitchen equipment. This opportunity is not limited to a single client; we anticipate involving you in additional projects for other clients if the results from the initial milestone meet our expectations. We are looking for the long term working relationships.

We will provide detailed transcripts, audio files, stock images, and text for inclusion in the videos. Additionally, we will supply you with the client's brand color scheme and other relevant details.

To understand our requirements, please refer to the examples of infographic videos linked here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1kUMFEboBnGHRCN6wu1W49uYuzV9h4FtM?usp=drive_link
These examples offer a brief illustration of the type of content we aim to produce.

Please respond to the screening questions provided. Bids submitted without answers to these questions will not be considered.

Budget: $120
Posted On: June 18, 2024 10:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Graphic Design, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Ukraine
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Music Video Edits - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create short music video edits with great effects. The ideal candidate will have a strong sense of timing, creativity, and the ability to bring a musical vision to life through visual storytelling. The main responsibilities will include selecting and trimming footage, adding transitions and effects, and syncing video with audio tracks. The successful candidate should have experience with professional video editing software and be familiar with current trends in music video production. Attention to detail, a strong aesthetic sense, and the ability to work within tight deadlines are essential.

Duration- 25-30 sec
Budget- $5 per video

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 18, 2024 10:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Music Video
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Creation of a Promotional Video for NU.O.RO - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a professional video editor to create a promotional video for the dietary supplement brand NU.O.RO. The video will be created using stock videos that I will select myself.

Reference:
The video should be inspired by the one on the homepage of this site: https://drinkag1.com/en-eu

Video Usage:
Website homepage
Social media
YouTube

Video Duration:
To be determined, but ideally around 30 seconds, based on the standards for this type of video.

Music:
The video must include royalty-free music.

NU.O.RO Values to Reflect in the Video:
Connection: Foster strong and meaningful relationships.
Authenticity: Live and communicate with transparency and sincerity.
Innovation: Pursue excellence and scientific progress for well-being.
Purity: Favor natural ingredients and environmentally friendly practices.
Vitality: Encourage a dynamic and active lifestyle.
Ethics: Act with integrity, social, and environmental responsibility.
Passion: Driven by a deep commitment to health and well-being.

Video Objectives:
Capture visitors' attention within the first few seconds.
Clearly and attractively communicate NU.O.RO's values and mission.
Inspire trust and convey a sense of well-being and vitality.
Encourage visitors to explore the site and products further.

Expected Deliverables:
Final video in multiple formats suitable for different platforms (website, social media, YouTube).
Source files of the project.

Required Skills:
Proven experience in video editing.
Ability to select and integrate stock videos coherently and aesthetically.
Knowledge of current trends in video marketing.
Creativity and sensitivity to visual communication.

How to Apply:
Please provide examples of similar videos you have created, along with a proposal for the price and timeline. Any suggestions for improving the project are welcome.


Hourly Range: $11.00-$33.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 09:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Music Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Music Video, Video Editing, Video Commercial
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Forex Trading Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create engaging and informative forex trading videos for our social media platforms. The primary focus will be on creating videos for Instagram Reels, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts. The videos should be visually appealing, concise, and easy to understand for our audience.

The videos we are looking for are short form, and for example show a trade that was done with a complete explanation on how this trade was taken.

Responsibilities:
- Develop creative concepts for forex trading videos
- Research and gather relevant information and data
- Create engaging and educational scripts
- Record and edit high-quality videos
- Incorporate visual effects and graphics to enhance the videos
- Ensure videos are optimized for each platform's specifications

Skills:
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
- Strong knowledge of forex trading concepts and strategies
- Ability to translate complex ideas into easily digestible content
- Excellent communication and storytelling skills
- Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

Salary: $1000 - $1500 per month, based on skill level
Duration: 6+ months
Expertise: Intermediate

If you are interested, please apply by sending us links to your previous work and describe your experience with forex trading and how you think you can help us grow our social media pages.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 09:38 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Forex Trading, Video Commercial, MetaTrader 4, Animation, Video Production
Skills: Forex Trading, Video Commercial, MetaTrader 4, Animation, Video Production
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Faceless Video Editor for Japanese Camera Blog - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a faceless video based on our blog about the Best Japanese Camera Models to buy. The video should effectively communicate the features and benefits of the camera models mentioned in the blog. As a video editor, you should have a strong knowledge and understanding of cameras to ensure that the video aligns with the content of the blog. Attention to detail and creativity are essential in order to produce a visually engaging and informative video.
  
Deliverables:
-Script
-Video incl: Subtitles, Voiceover, and engaging effects.

item.title: Video Editor for Facebook Advertisements - Upwork
item.description:
We are a brand in the relaxation and music products industry, dedicated to improving the well-being of our customers through innovative and effective solutions. As part of our efforts to enhance our online marketing, we are seeking a creative video editor to enhance our dynamic marketing team.

Responsibilities:

Produce and edit multiple advertisement videos for Facebook, ranging from 30 seconds to 5 minutes, using provided company materials.
- Add subtitles, text overlays, and sound effects to ensure the videos are engaging and effective in capturing viewer attention and driving conversions.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure video content aligns with brand guidelines and campaign goals.
- Contribute creative ideas to increase viewer engagement and conversion rates through compelling video content.


Required Qualifications:
- Demonstrated experience in video editing, specifically for social media advertising.
- Skilled in using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or equivalent.
- Fluent in English with excellent communication skills.
- Capable of working under tight deadlines and handling pressure effectively.
- A creative mindset and keen attention to detail, with a passion for creating videos that engage and persuade audiences.

Please submit your resume along with a cover letter and samples of your previous video work through our standard application process.

We are excited to see how your creativity and skills in video editing can contribute to our marketing efforts and help us reach and engage more customers in the relaxation and music space!


Posted On: June 18, 2024 09:15 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Apple iMovie, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: CapCut, Apple iMovie, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Facebook Ad Creative Editor needed - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for a skilled Video and Image Editor to create engaging and high-quality visuals for Meta and TikTok ad campaigns and social media accounts. Your role will involve editing and producing compelling images and videos to align with our brand's aesthetic and campaign goals.

Requirements:

- Proficiency in video editing software.
- Creativity, attention to detail, and a good eye for aesthetics.
- Ability to work to tight deadlines and follow specific guidelines.
- Excellent communication skills.

I look forward to seeing your work and potentially working together on this exciting project!

Looking forward to your applications and a successful collaboration!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00

Skills:Video Commercial, Testimonial Video, Music Video, Concept Video, Graphic Design, Video Editing
